column1: Remapping scheme for Neuronexus probes ISO_3x_tet_lin ('Isomura custom probe'; Ser nr A074)

Note probesites are arranged according to anatomical layout: probe ch32 is closest to headstage on far left shank, probe ch1 is at probe tip ie most ventral (at bottom of collumn) on far right shank; for each of these sites the corresponding Intan channel is shown
